mapper.sql: seq, delNy, id, name, email, password, signupDate, lastLoginDate, address, addressDetail, `rank`, bedge, gender,
FROM member WHERE 1=1 AND delNy LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shKeyword},'%')
mapper.select: SELECT seq, id, name FROM member WHERE 1=1 AND id = #{id} AND password = #{password}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET delNy = #{delNy}, id = #{id}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, signupDate = NOW(), lastLoginDate = #{lastLoginDate}, address = #{address}, addressDetail = #{addressDetail}, `rank` = #{rank}, badge = #{badge}, gender = #{gender} WHERE seq = #{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( delNy, id, name, email, password, signupDate, lastLoginDate, address, addressDetail, `rank`, badge, gender ) VALUES ( #{delNy}, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{password}, NOW(), NULL, #{address}, #{addressDetail}, #{rank}, #{badge}, #{gender} )
